column3: All disputes are to be resolved by arbitration and referred to arbitration in London, before three arbitrators. Each party can select an arbitrator, with the third agreed upon, or nominated by the two appointed arbitrators, or by the ICC Court of Arbitration. Proceedings are to be in English. Appeal rights are waived. The arbitration award is to be final and binding.
column7: Arbitrage et règlement des différends//Arbitration and dispute resolution
column8: All disputes are to be resolved by arbitration and referred to arbitration in London, before three arbitrators. Each party can select an arbitrator, with the third agreed upon, or nominated by the two appointed arbitrators, or by the ICC Court of Arbitration. Proceedings are to be in English. Appeal rights are waived. The arbitration award is to be final and binding. --Arts. 7(i), (ii), (iii), (iv), (v)
